meanings.sent1: She repacks her suitcase before every trip.
meanings.sent2: He repacks the boxes to make sure everything fits.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel repacks its cheeks with nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: Time repacks memories in the attic of our minds.
meanings.sent5: The magician repacks the trick to amaze the audience.

meanings.sent1: The student repacks his bag after school.
meanings.sent2: The worker repacks the products for shipping.
meanings.sent3: The cat repacks its toys in a playful manner.
meanings.sent4: Hope repacks itself in the heart after despair.
meanings.sent5: The wind repacks the fallen leaves in a swirling dance.
